Plot: An ensemble piece examining the health risks involved in the fast food industry and its environmental and social consequences as well.
Title: Fast Food Nation
Writer: Eric Schlosser, Richard Linklater, Eric Schlosser (book)
Actors: Wilmer Valderrama, Catalina Sandino Moreno, Ana Claudia Talancón, Juan Carlos Serrán
tomatoConsensus: Despite some fine performances and memorable scenes, Fast Food Nation is more effective as Eric Schlosser's eye-opening non-fiction book than as Richard Linklater's fictionalized, mostly punchless movie.
